description: Enterprise techniques used by Trojan.Mebromi, ATT&CK software S0001 v1.1
name: Trojan.Mebromi (S0001)

techniques.comment: [Trojan.Mebromi](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0001) performs BIOS modification and can download and execute a file as well as protect itself from removal.(Citation: Ge 2011)
